title: Split
text: Split the radicals into the product of two square roots, one of which can be simplified to a single number such as $$\sqrt{4}$$ or $$\sqrt{16}$$.

title: Simplify
text: Now, simplify the radicals so that there is a product of a constant(or variable) and a square root.

title: Remove common factors
text: Remove the common factors of the numerator and denominator by dividing them out.
